title: 01/07/21 - DPS - Best of
itunes:title: 01/07/21 - DPS - Best of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, given what happened at the Capitol building yesterday it's hard to stick to sports. DP Reacts to yesterday's events and discusses the intersection between sports and real life news. We're also joined by former NFL QB and ESPN Analyst Dan Orlovsky and Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio to preview this weekend's NFL playoff picture. Will Jared Goff play for the Rams? Who has the best shot at an upset? Plus, Dan has some information from his sources about the College Football National Title Game scheduled to be played Monday

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
